abstract.t: The BGP Monitoring Protocol (BMP) [RFC7854] is designed to monitor BGP [RFC4271] running status, such as BGP peer relationship establishment and termination and route updates. At present, the BMP only monitors the incoming bgp routes (Adj-RIB-In), does not monitor the outgoing bgp routes (Adj-RIB-Out). This draft extends the applicability of BMP [RFC7854] to monitor the outgoing bgp routes.
